message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, let's start with a good compromise!
You can't have it all, but I'll give you a decent deal
You're getting desperate, don't you think?
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a better deal this time
You're getting closer to the middle ground!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, let's make a deal
We're getting close, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm not going to give in, you're going to have to make a better offer
You're getting close to the edge, don't push your luck!
I'm not backing down, I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
No more games, this is my final offer!
